text: The 2020 Magnolia Hotshots season will be the 32nd season of the franchise in the Philippine Basketball Association (PBA). ==Key dates== *December 8: The 2019 PBA draft took place in Midtown Atrium, Robinson Place Manila. *March 11: The PBA postponed the season due to the threat of the coronavirus. ==Draft picks== {| class="wikitable sortable sortable" style="text-align: center" !
